message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $1300000. This is a special offer tailored to your needs, and I hope we can reach an agreement that benefits both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I'm willing to pay $1200000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
